mapper.insert: insert into course_resource (course_resource_id, course_resource_path, course_id, course_resource_filename, upload_time) values (#{courseResourceId}, #{courseResourcePath}, #{courseId}, #{courseResourceFilename}, #{uploadTime})
mapper.select: select * from course_resource where course_id = #{courseId} order by course_resource_id DESC

select course_resource_filename as courseResourceFilename, course_resource_id as courseResourceId, course.course_id as courseId, semester as semester, academic_year as academicYear, course_name as courseName from course_resource, course where course_resource_id = #{id} and course_resource.course_id = course.course_id
